summary.span: 命名空间包含将 Microsoft .NET Framework 公共语言运行时 (CLR) 集成到 Microsoft SQL Server 和 SQL Server 数据库引擎进程执行环境时所要用到的类、接口和枚举。

span.span: The namespace contains classes, interfaces, and enumerations that are specific to the integration of the Microsoft .NET Framework common language runtime (CLR) into Microsoft SQL Server, and the SQL Server database engine process execution environment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用的特性中的类命名空间，你可以创建存储的过程、 触发器、 用户定义的类型、 用户定义函数 （标量和表值） 和用户定义聚合函数中任何受支持的.NET Framework语言。Using the attribute classes in the namespace, you can create stored procedures, triggers, user-defined types, user-defined functions (both scalar and table-valued), and user-defined aggregate functions in any supported .NET Framework language. 此外可以在 SQL Server 中注册它们。You can also register them in SQL Server. 查询类以确定是否当前正在执行代码正在运行 SQL Server 数据库引擎进程中。Query the class to determine whether the currently executing code is running in the SQL Server database engine process. 当用户在服务器上，调用的托管存储的过程或函数时或当用户执行任何操作触发的托管的代码触发器，这也让调用方的上下文。This also provides the caller's context when a user calls a managed stored procedure or function on the server, or when a user's action fires a managed code trigger. 类提供对象，通过该结果返回到客户端从存储过程、对象，它提供有关引起要激发的触发器的操作的信息，和一个对象，该对象可以用于确定调用客户端的标识，客户端进行身份验证使用集成的安全性时。The class provides a object, through which results are returned to the client from a stored procedure, a object, which provides information about the operation that caused a trigger to be fired, and a object, which can be used to determine the identity of the calling client when the client used integrated security for authentication. 有关 SQL Server CLR 集成和中的 Api 的详细信息命名空间，请参阅 SQL Server 联机丛书。For more information about SQL Server CLR integration and the APIs in the namespace, see SQL Server Books Online.
